name: Paper io 2: Mishmash DLC
summary:
Conquer new maps with your friends in mishmash skins!
With this DLC you'll unlock:
- 13 diverse skins: bus, burger, donut, poop, toilet, ufo, robot, ninja, santa, crab, car, police car, airplane
- 5 hats: widget, "truck" cap, helmet with horns, apple with an arrow, witch hat
- 9 custom game maps in the form of a: car, boat, poop, sport bike, cruiser, scooter, headphones, teddy bear, crown
- 10000 coins

Put on funny mishmash skins, change the look of your territory and take over new custom maps!
